subject: Broken LED - Simsonn Pro X Pedals
description_text:
Hi,

Hoping this is the correct email to contact, I've recently purchased and received the Simsonn Pro X pedals, but unfortunately on the pedal the LED is partially broken.
My Order Number is #SSN5160, and I've attached a photo of the pedal LED.

Is it possible to get a new Accelerator pedal?

Thanks,
Kieron

conversations.body_text: Hi Kieron Proctor,  Is the right-side LED of the ProX Ultra throttle damaged? We can send you a complete right-side LED strip assembly, making it easy for you to replace it.Â

Hi,

The Left-hand side is OK and working, if you can send me the right-side LED strip to replace that'd be great.
Thanks for the quick response!

Kieron
________________________________
Hi Kieron Proctor,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047219201311
